about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME


Embark on an exciting adventure in Think and Coop, an arcade game designed with cooperative gameplay in mind, available both offline and online. Rest assured, you can also play alone if you prefer that kind of gameplay. Together or alone, you'll traverse both forest and fairy tale worlds, completing level after level and encountering new challenges that will require you to become more and more skilled.

Master the art of jumping to achieve perfection, and no challenge will be impossible for you to overcome. However, remember that the most important thing is cooperation - without it you will not be able to progress. You need to be perfectly in sync and consistent in what you do.

MAIN FEATURES


Cooperation - Enjoy the game together on one computer, using different controllers! Even on a remote island... as long as there is access to electricity! Of course, you can also play online!

Competition - Of course, while co-op is the foundation, a healthy dose of rivalry is not to be overlooked. Think & Co-op also features a RACE mode where you can compete against each other to see who can complete the level first.

Varied Gameplay - As you progress from level to level, you will discover new mechanics and increasingly varied obstacles. This will contribute to a rich experience at every stage of the game.

Distinctive characters - you will be able to choose the character you will control throughout the game. And that's not all - you'll also be able to customize your character's appearance.

short_description: Think and Coop is an exciting arcade game designed for offline and online collaboration. Travel through forests and fairytale lands to complete levels and face new challenges. Full synchronization and teamwork are the keys to success in this fantastic adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
